Description: Labour market status (employment, unemployment and inactivity) of disabled people. This table is updated four times a year in February, May, August and November. These estimates are sourced from the Labour Force Survey, a survey of households.
Name: Labour Force Survey: A08: Labour market status of disabled people
Sizing Notes: Table structure not simple. Multiple dimensions, many wih subdimensions and footnotes. Quite a few tabs.
Stakeholder Engagement notes: Yes. Looks like all dimensions, etc. on PMD.
